Sub Welcome To Academy: ICD Academy is a new generation educational project based on modern teaching methods in Azerbaijan. Our professional teachers have many years of local and foreign pedagogical experience, they work as specialists in their field in leading companies of Azerbaijan. During the training, we have devoted the main time to practical training, along with theoretical knowledge. All training programs are based on real and current experience.
Bütün məzunlarımızı işlə təmin etmək. On: To provide employment to all our graduates. Prepare them spiritually and psychologically
Tələbələrimizə ən keyfiyyətli nəzəri və: To provide the best quality theoretical and practical education to our students. Create the most beautiful environment for them
Azərbaycanda tədris sahəsində ən yüksək: To organize the highest level educational institution in the field of education in Azerbaijan
SubMuhit: Our classrooms are equipped with modern equipment. We created comfortable conditions for our students to learn science. Our large library, dining room, and comfortable places to spend your leisure time are organized. We have created a safe and healthy environment in our academy.
FooterTitle: ICD Academy is a new generation educational project based on modern teaching methods in Azerbaijan
Şirkətimiz 2002-ci ildə təsis olunmuşdur: Our company was founded in 2002. Our 20 years of professional experience ensures that our students receive the most up-to-date knowledge for the best start in their careers. Acting as a kind of bridge between the labor market and companies, we help both young professionals to choose the right vacancy, and companies to find the right staff and avoid additional loss of time.
Təlim satış şöbəsində işləyən şəxslərlə: The training is designed for people who work in the sales department, as well as those who want to work in this field in the future and people who want to further improve their sales experience. The mission of the training is to train sales representatives (sales managers) in accordance with world standards to operate in companies or individually. Duration: 32 hours / 2 months. 1 Group composition: 15 people
Bu təlimlər seçdiyi peşə istiqamətindən: These trainings are designed for people of all ages who are interested in their personal development, regardless of their chosen professional direction. Duration: 16 hours / 2 months. Composition of the group: 15 people. Purpose of the training: The purpose of the training is to support the personal development of our young people who aim to work in different companies with the help of theoretical and practical training. With the help of these trainings, it is intended to form the knowledge, skills and habits necessary for candidates to demonstrate high performance in the companies they will work for. Trainings are organized in an interactive manner and every candidate is given the opportunity to actively participate in the process. In addition to information in the form of various slides, videos, pictures, text, questionnaires and evaluation forms, the use of visual aids intended for games and team competitions is planned.
Təlimin missiyası şirkətlər və ya fərdi: The mission of the training is to train sales representatives (sales managers) in accordance with world standards to operate in companies or individually.
Satış anlayışı, satıcı bacarıqları, satı: It includes comprehensive and practical explanations of the concepts of sales, sales skills, sales tools, customer, stages of sales, sales techniques, dealing with objections and after-sales service.
Peşəkar Satış üzrə Təlimçi. 2009-cu ildə: Personal Development Trainer. Work Experience: executive director at "Shams" Educational Center (Baku). Director of "New Way" Educational Center (Baku). Student coach in the dormitory (Istanbul). Director of "Vizyon" Personal Development Center (Baku).
WhatsL: What will you learn in this course?
Şəxsi inkişaf təlimlərimiz seçdiyi peşə: Our personal development trainings are designed for individuals of all ages who are interested in their personal development depending on their chosen profession. There is a personal initiative of our young people working in companies regarding the means of training based on theory and practical training. With the help of these trainings, the knowledge, skills, and habits necessary to work in the activities and procedures in the process of getting a job are kept in the form. The trainings are organized interactively and every participant is given the opportunity to actively participate in the process. During the trainings, various slides, videos, pictures, text, information in the form of questionnaires and evaluation forms are used as well as visual aids for games and team competitions.
Rasim Dəmirli, 2009-cu ildən aktiv olara: Rasim Demirli has been actively working in sales since 2009. He has more than 10 years of sales experience. Until 2019, he worked as a sales specialist and sales director in many companies. Since 2019, he has worked as the founder and director of Green Park Service. Currently on sale.
İlkin uçot sənədlərinin hazırlanması, On: Preparation of primary accounting documents, Online Clerkship and E-invoices, Bank transactions, Accounting of long-term assets, Accounting of short-term assets, Liabilities, Accounting reports, Compilation of tax reports, Explanation of 1 C software.
Bu kursda tələbələr dünyanın hər yerində: In this course, students will gain knowledge about manufacturers, suppliers and carriers from all over the world, where and how to buy quality goods at a bargain price, how to arrange and bring them.
Təlim, satış şöbəsində işləyən şəxslərlə: The training is designed for people who work in the sales department, as well as those who want to work in this field in the future and people who want to further improve their sales experience. The mission of the training is to train sales representatives (sales managers) in accordance with world standards to operate in companies or individually. Duration: 32 hours / 2 months. 1 Group composition: 15 people
TƏLİMİN MÜDDƏTİ: 16 dərs günü / 64 saat: DURATION OF TRAINING: 16 school days / 64 hours / 2 months / every Saturday and Sunday. Note: classes are conducted in a mixed theoretical and practical manner. Each lesson is 50 minutes + 10 minutes break. 4th Lesson 60 minutes. Homework. GROUP COMPOSITION: 10-15 people. PURPOSE OF THE TRAINING: As a result of the training, each student will receive the 1st level Help Desk status based on the exam.
Satış nədir? · Satıcı Kimdir? · Satıcı b: What is a sale? · Who is the seller? · Sales skills. · Sales Tools · Customer · Stages of Sales · Stages of Sales · Sales Techniques · Retail Merchandising · Merchandising · Objections - Failures - Errors · Closing the Sale · Full Stage Sales Cycle · Closing
Təlimin missiyası şirkətlərdə optimal və: The mission of the training is to give the participants practical knowledge and skills for creating and developing an optimal and effective human resources management system in companies, to interpret the requirements of the legislation in this area, to train in methodologies used in this area.
Peşəkar Satış üzrə Təlimçi. 2009-cu ildə: Professional Sales Trainer. He has been actively working in the field of sales since 2009. He has more than 10 years of sales experience. Until 2019, he worked as a sales specialist and sales director in many companies. Since 2019, he has worked as the founder and director of "Green Park Service" company. Currently, he is a sales trainer and consultant. Human psychology study course certificate (Enneagram Eğitim ve Darışmanlık-Turkey). Certificate of Educational Business Management (DADASHSOY BUSINESS SCHOOL)
HR Menecment üzrə ekspert, HR Menecer. İ: HR Management expert, HR Manager. He has more than 15 years of work experience in the field of Human Resources Management. He is currently working with some companies as an HR expert. He is a trainer and consultant in the field of Human Resources, a specialist in HR, ISO 9001:2015, ISO 9001:2007 and OHSAS 18001:2007.
Mühasibat üzrə təlimçi. Təhsil Azərbayca: Accounting trainer. Education Azerbaijan State University of Economics (Bachelor) - Major: Finance (2011–2015) Azerbaijan State University of Economics (Master) - Major: Financial Management (Education in English) (2016–2018)
Şəxsi İnkişaf üzrə Təlimçi. İş Təcrübəsi: Personal Development Trainer. Work Experience: executive director at "Shams" Educational Center (Baku). Director of "New Way" Educational Center (Baku). Student coach in the dormitory (Istanbul). Director of "Vizyon" Personal Development Center (Baku).
